english.segment1: Sadness and rhyme. These are the times. These are the memories. We find a way. Pushing through the day
english.segment2: So speak to me gently. Can you just feel the time. Falling from some place new?. Can you just feel the sign?. Love waits for you. Love waits for you
english.segment3: I'm searching the stars. In desperate hours. Bound to find meaning. God shows a face. In this desolate place. And tenderness meets me
english.segment4: Stories untold. Of redwoods grown old. Reside in the forest. And there you can hear. A whispering tear. That speaks into our loneliness.
